cnf:field.name: Application
cnf:field.preset: TruSeq DNA sequencing (large genome de novo)
TruSeq DNA sequencing (small genome de novo)

cnf:field.name: Clusters on Index in Lane from Target (%)
On Bait Bases from On Target Bases (%)
Top Sample Tag Rate from All Detected (%)
Top Sample Tag Rate from Total (%)

ptp:process-type.name: Cluster Generation (HiSeq X) 1.0 McGill 1.0

parameter.name: Generate bcl2fastq Sample Sheet
parameter.string: bash -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -u {username} -p {password} -i {processURI:v2} script:setUDF -f 'Progress' -t '//input/@uri->//sample/@uri' -v 'Library ready for sequencing' script:initArtifactUDFs && /opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/Illumina_HiSeqX/v1/EPP/hiseqx-extensions.jar script:generate_bcl2fastq_sample_sheet -u {username} -p {password} -i {processURI:v2} -c {compoundOutputFileLuid1} -e {compoundOutputFileLuid2}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Lab Tracking Form,bcl2fastq Sample Sheet,bcl2fastq Sample Sheet Generation Log}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display the UDF information associated with all the outputs

ptp:process-type.name: Illumina Sequencing (HiSeq X) 1.0 McGill 1.1

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Illumina Run Report,Link to Run Folder,Run Parameters,Run Info,First Base Report,Lab Tracking Form,Samples for Pipeline(TAB v.4),Analysis report from pipeline (TAB v4),Log file}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display and maximize the Input/Output Explorer mini-tabbed page

ptp:process-type.name: Library Normalization (HiSeq X) 1.0 McGill 1.4

field-definition.name: Library volume (uL) transferred to DESTINATION plate

parameter.name: Copy Library Volume
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t false -h false -exp 'output.::Library Volume (ul)::=input.::Library Volume (ul):: ' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid2}"

parameter.name: Test 1
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t true -h false -exp 'output.::Library Concentration (nM):: = input.::Concentration:: ; output.::Library Volume To Use (ul):: = (step.::Target Concentration (nM):: * step.::Target Volume (ul)::) / input.::Concentration:: ; output.::Diluent Volume (ul):: = step.::Target Volume (ul):: - output.::Library Volume To Use (ul):: ; if (output.::Library Volume To Use (ul):: > step.::Maximum Library Volume Threshold (ul)::) {output.::Denaturation Sample Volume (ul):: = step.::Target Concentration (nM):: / input.::Concentration:: * 4.36} else {output.::Denaturation Sample Volume (ul):: = 4.36} ; if (output.::Library Volume To Use (ul):: > step.::Maximum Library Volume Threshold (ul)::) {output.::EB Volume (ul):: = 6.2 + 4.36 - output.::Denaturation Sample Volume (ul)::} else {output.::EB Volume (ul):: = 6.2} ' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid2}"

field-definition.name: On Bait Bases from On Target Bases (%)
Top Sample Tag Rate from All Detected (%)

Clusters on Index in Lane from Target (%)

Library Kit Name

cnf:field.name: Primers Sequence
cnf:field.preset: AAT GAT ACG GCG ACC ACC GAG A, CAA GCA GAA GAC GGC ATA CGA G /5 uM

step-property.value: 1/{LIST:Lab Tracking Form,Normalization Buffer Volumes CSV,Calculation Log}|2/{LIST:Lab Tracking Form,Normalization Buffer Volumes CSV,Calculation Log}
step-property.name: autoAttachFiles

step-property.value: 8/{LIST:Illumina Run Report,Link to Run Folder,Run Parameters,Run Info,First Base Report,Lab Tracking Form,Samples for Pipeline(TAB v.4),Analysis report from pipeline (TAB v4),Log file}
